messages.event-setting-polls-des: Let your participants share their opinions add let them vote instantly.
messages.event-setting-ideas-des: Collect and curate ideas at breainstorming sessions with your colleagues or clients.
messages.event-setting-idea-guest-des: Let your participants send anonymous ideas.
messages.event-setting-share-access-des: Invite others to help you with managing this event.
messages.event-setting-privacy-subtitle: Change visibility of your event in search results and control who can access it.
messages.event-setting-search-des: Hide the event from search results. Entering full event code is required to join the events.
messages.event-moderation-des: Easily review all questions before they go live.
messages.event-setting-poll-counter-des: Show how many participants voted in your poll.
messages.event-setting-poll-result-des: Show number of votes insted of percentage.
messages.event-welcome: To get started, create your first event.
messages.event-attendees-info: Attendees are able to join your event within dates you select.
messages.empty-archive: You can archive questions in the "Live" tab after they were answered or are no longer relevant.
messages.sub-sologan: The Ultimate Q&A and Polling Platform for Company Meetings and Events
messages.moderation-view-des: Incomming questions will automatically appear live.
messages.poll-empty-title: There is no active poll at the moment.
messages.poll-empty-subtitle: Create your first poll and click "Activate"
messages.err-question-limit: You have exceed the maximum number of characters allowed for question
messages.err-reply-limit: You have exceed the maximum number of characters allowed for reply
messages.err-reply: Could not send message. Sorry, try again!
messages.err-event-not-found: Sorry, there is no such event active right now
messages.err-some-field: Sorry, please check your info again
messages.guest-del-question-dialog: Sorry, the question has been deleted by the administrator
messages.guest-reply-disable: Reply have been turn off by Admin
messages.guest-question-disable: Ask Question have been turn off by Admin.
messages.guest-question-on-moderation: Câu hỏi của bạn đang được quản trị viên phê duyệt
messages.guest-empty-question: There are no questions asked yet.
messages.anonymous-info-update-success: Your information has been updated successfully
messages.card-header-title: The best way to make your speech perfect
messages.card-subheader-title: No more restrictions, no more limits
messages.card-intro-des1: The workshop is a meeting of a group of people with the same common interest at a predetermined place and time to debate the content of interest. The most popular seminars are based on industries, careers, and general fans.
messages.card-intro-des2: The workshop is a meeting of a group of people with the same common interest at a predetermined place and time to debate the content of interest. The most popular seminars are based on industries, careers, and general fans.
messages.card-intro-des3: The workshop is a meeting of a group of people with the same common interest at a predetermined place and time to debate the content of interest. The most popular seminars are based on industries, careers, and general fans.
messages.phone-intro-description: Adaptable to all mobile devices today, easy to manipulate. Participants in presentations and seminars can easily ask questions / vote / polls.
messages.experience-title: Let's make your next event more interactive.
